shortDescription:

about me: i am a 25 yr. old male who flew  [...]

title: ride offered - south bend to indianapolis on tue 11/6 (south bend)
shortDescription:
i'm offering a ride from south bend to indianapolis. 
leaving november 6th returning november 7th. contact me on zimride: http://www.zimride.com/ride/share?ride=518659

title: ride to virginia asap (elkhart)
shortDescription: me and my aunt are in a tight situation. we have a place to stay in virginia and just need a ride. if anyone is heading that way and can help please contact me.

title: ride offered south bend to pittsburgh (three rivers, michigan)
shortDescription:
i am driving from southern michigan, to pittsburgh on 10/24 or 10/25. let me know if you need a ride to pittsburgh or anywhere along the way, and we can figure out a gas price, and i can pick you up most anyplace within reason. 
hannah
